description: Gets a list of distribution IDs for distributions that have a cache behavior that's associated with the specified cache policy. You can optionally specify the maximum number of items to receive in the response. If the total number of items in the list exceeds the maximum that you specify, or the default maximum, the response is paginated. To get the next page of items, send a subsequent request that specifies the NextMarker value from the current response as the Marker value in the subsequent request.

parameters.name: CachePolicyId
parameters.description: The ID of the cache policy whose associated distribution IDs you want to list.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: The value provided in the Marker request field.

nested_items.name: NextMarker
nested_items.description: Contains the value that you should use in the Marker field of a subsequent request to continue listing distribution IDs where you left off.

nested_items.name: MaxItems
nested_items.description: The maximum number of distribution IDs requested.

nested_items.name: IsTruncated
nested_items.description: A flag that indicates whether more distribution IDs remain to be listed. If your results were truncated, you can make a subsequent request using the Marker request field to retrieve more distribution IDs in the list.

nested_items.name: Quantity
nested_items.description: The total number of distribution IDs returned in the response.

nested_items.name: Items
nested_items.description: Contains the distribution IDs in the list.
